issue.title: When running RVIZ tutorial, there is an issue with the lidar

content.raw:
I finally realized what could be the possible source of error. If you look at [pull request 216](#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/216/fix-issue-188/diff), you can see that generation of URDF from the yaml file format has changed for the GPS and IMU sensor. As such, even my old custom URDF build was no longer working but all I had to do was regenerate the URDF based on the command provided in the [generating URDF tutorial](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/Creating%20a%20custom%20WAM-V%20Thruster%20and%20Sensor%20Configuration%20For%20Competition). For simplicity, I have included the relevant command for you:  

```
roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_wamv.launch thruster_yaml:=$HOME/my_wamv/thruster_config.yaml sensor_yaml:=$HOME/my_wamv/sensor_config.yaml wamv_target:=$HOME/my_wamv/my_wamv.urdf
```

‌

Hopefully this resolves the error for you.
content.html:
I finally realized what could be the possible source of error. If you look at pull request 216, you can see that generation of URDF from the yaml file format has changed for the GPS and IMU sensor. As such, even my old custom URDF build was no longer working but all I had to do was regenerate the URDF based on the command provided in the generating URDF tutorial. For simplicity, I have included the relevant command for you: 

roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_wamv.launch thruster_yaml:=$HOME/my_wamv/thruster_config.yaml sensor_yaml:=$HOME/my_wamv/sensor_config.yaml wamv_target:=$HOME/my_wamv/my_wamv.urdf

‌

Hopefully this resolves the error for you.
